channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump embraces Dem policies traditionally rejected by GOP in bid to build 'party of common sense'
item.description: President Donald Trump's policies, including drug price controls and tax reforms, reflect a blend of Republican and Democratic ideas.

item.title: The Audacious AI Agenda of Pope Leo XIV
item.description: The new pope has a chance to apply the Catholic Church’s wisdom to the profound challenges AI presents.

item.title: Trump says U.S. will assign tariff amounts in two to three weeks
item.description: President Trump says trade officials will dispatch letters to countries assigning them a tariff amount because it would be impossible to meet with "15...

item.title: Don’t Blame Pro-Lifers For Medical Malpractice Or Risky Abortion Drugs
item.description: Every pro-life law, without exception, contains provisions that allow for emergency medical intervention to save a mother’s life.

item.title: The Week: Trump in the Middle East
item.description: Plus: China and the U.S. called off their embargoes on each other.

item.title: Trump says Iran has been given nuclear proposal from the U.S.
item.description: President Trump said Friday that Iran has been presented with a nuclear deal from the United States.

item.title: The two female CEOs behind Foot Locker and Dick’s Sporting Goods’ $2.4 billion deal

item.title: Europe’s ability to attract investment and create jobs is at its lowest in 9 years—and the U.S. is partly to blame
item.description: France, U.K., and Germany had the most foreign projects—but there was a double-digit decline in the number of projects in each country, EY found.

item.title: Disney’s New Abu Dhabi Park Trades Americana For Globalism
item.description: By giving in to the West-hating, slave labor-fueled, globalist agenda, Disney has cannibalized all the things that once made it great.

item.title: Will Trump’s Free-Market Drug Pricing Solution Cut Out Greedy Middlemen?
item.description: An executive order instructs the HHS secretary to negotiate with drug manufacturers so that Americans pay the same low prices that others do.

item.title: 70% of neurodiverse adults say they’re facing increased stigma at work, and the ongoing corporate rollback of DEI programs could make the situation worse
item.description: Stigmas are holding some neurodivergent employees back from getting the accommodations they need.

item.title: Legal Filing: Smartmatic Was Hemorrhaging Cash Long Before 2020 Election Controversy
item.description: Customers rejected Smartmatic for reasons unrelated to Fox. For example, the filing said, Smartmatic’s equipment was not certified.

item.title: The Left’s Outcry Over South African Refugees Exposes Their Anti-White Bigotry
item.description: All the moral talk of giving justice to the persecuted, helping the helpless, liberating the oppressed — it only ever goes one way.

item.title: Dahomey Deconstructs Cultural Gatekeeping
item.description: Mati Diop plies her guilt trade.
